name: Midnight Scenes: The Highway (Special Edition)
description:
This game is a bite-sized experience (~15 minutes of gameplay). Perfect for your coffee break!

Turn off the lights and enter the mysterious world of Midnight Scenes: The Highway.

  • First in a series of short horror adventure games. Explore, solve puzzles, be very afraid.
  • Atmospheric black and white pixel art, inspired on horror and mystery shows from the 60's like The Twilight Zone and The Outer Limits.
  • Eerie soundtrack.



Included in this Special Edition:
  • Critically acclaimed short game Midnight Scenes: The Highway by Octavi Navarro, creator of Pixels Huh and artist on games like Thimbleweed Park and Photographs.
  • Beautiful PDF book of art from the game.
  • Original soundtrack.
  • Game localized to French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, and Simplified Chinese.

Where to find the PDF Art Book and the Original Soundtrack:

To access this content please do the following...

  • Right click the game in your Steam Library and select "Properties".
  • Under the "Local Files" tab, select “Browse Local Files”.
  • Within the game's local files, locate the "extra_content" folder.
